Articles.Content: I was thinking if it would be possible for someone to include the 2nd gas giant, as seen here. There isn't much about it, all the article states is that it is 9000km in diameter, has four major moons as well as multiple tiny moons, and is beyond Jool. is it possible for someone to put this into the game? As a mod, of course.
This is on the "what not to suggest" list. Mainly because it has been suggested dozens, if not hundreds of times already.

Additional planets are indeed on the What not to suggest list; however, as Llama1017 is asking for a mod, I've moved this thread to the General Add-on Affairs forum, where such requests are made.

Perhaps someone can point you to a list of existing mods, including some that add planets.
